Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.table

Class Table

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.table.Table
public class Table extends Object
Models game's table, so everything that is set on the table while playing the game: bags, clouds and islands (excluding player's dashboard).
